video_prompt: Glowing cross pulsates with an ethereal warmth, surrounded by a viscous, dissolving dark mass. Chromatic aberrations shimmer and shift, spreading like digital decay. Horizontal and vertical glitch lines tear across the frame, creating dynamic, fragmented color fields that ripple and distort the background.
image_prompt: Abstract digital artwork featuring a glowing cross with fiery orange-red edges, enveloped by a textured, amorphous black mass. Emphasize strong glitched and chromatic aberration effects, with dominant red, cyan, and magenta horizontal/vertical lines and blocks on a stark white background, evoking digital decay and technological interference.
refined_video_prompt: A cross pulsates with expanding and contracting ethereal warmth. A surrounding dark, viscous mass actively dissolves and recedes. Chromatic aberrations shimmer, shifting and spreading across the scene like digital decay. Horizontal and vertical glitch lines rapidly tear across the frame, dynamically fragmenting and distorting the background in rippling color fields.
